summary: 🐺 *wags tail excitedly: Hrrr-hmm? 🌲 *takes a cautious step forward, ears perked up*. Whrr-whrr... 🕰️ *runs through a dark cave with sparkly fireflies lighting the way: *wriggles*!
dream:
🐺 *twirls around in circles, tail wagging excitedly*: Ooohh! 🌟
💫 *chases after sparkling fireflies, trying to catch them*: Hrrr-hmm? 
Whrr-whrr... 🕰️ *runs through a dark cave with sparkly fireflies lighting the way*: *wriggles*
😊 *pounces on a glittery leaf, batting it playfully*: Ooohh!
🌙 *follows the sparkling trail of fireflies up into the night sky*: Hrrr-ooo! 
🐺 *cuddles with the sparkly fireflies, who whisper secrets in her ear*: Shhhh... 🌲
😊 *giggles and plays with the whispers, chasing after them in a joyful romp*: Whrr-whrr!
goal:
🐺 *whimpers softly: Hrrr-hmm? 🌲 *takes another cautious step forward, ears perked up*. Whrr-whrr... *paws tremble with a mix of fear and curiosity*

🤔 *sniffs the air curiously: Hrrr-hmm? 
*scratches behind ear with a paw, releasing a tiny howl*: Whrr-whrr...
💫 *stares up at the moon, trying to understand its secrets*: Ooohh!
